WebDriverErrorsInvalidCookieDomain.summary: The invalid cookie domain error is a WebDriver error that occurs when an illegal attempt was made to set a cookie under a different domain than that of the current document.

remarks.para: In WebDriver it is not permissible to set cookies for other domains than the domain of the current browsing context's document's domain.
This error will also happen if the document is cookie-averse, that is if the document is not loaded via http://, https://, or ftp://.

-List of WebDriver errors
-Relevant WebDriver commands:-Add Cookie
-Delete Cookie
-Delete All Cookies
-Get All Cookies
-Get Named Cookie
